 PLFilterColorize (double Hue, double Saturation)
virtual void ApplyInPlace (PLBmpBase *pBmp) const
 In-Place Apply. Applies the filter to pBmp.

Detailed Description

Filter that colorizes a bitmap given a hue and saturation. Corresponds loosely to the photoshop hue/saturation control when set to 'colorize'. The range of hue is 0..359, the range of saturation is 0..100.
